plugins.description: Brainstorming workflow: topic research → multi-model ideation → idea evaluation → report generation

plugins.description: General-purpose hook collection: intent evaluation, log backup, code quality, smart routing, security, session management

plugins.name: security-audit

plugins.name: feature-impl

plugins.description: Test-Driven Development pipeline with Agent Team (test-writer → implementer → coverage-validator)

plugins.description: Multi-angle bug investigation with Agent Team (Fan-Out: log-analyst + code-tracer + reproducer)

plugins.name: database-design
plugins.description: Database design with Agent Team Debate pattern (schema-designer vs query-optimizer)

plugins.name: refactor-team
plugins.description: Team-based refactoring pipeline (analyzer → refactorer → reviewer) with safety validation

plugins.description: CSV-driven plan-execute pipeline with Agent Team (investigator → CSV contract → implementer + reviewer per-issue loop)
